athipujya wathuregama nyanohasa mahanayaka mahimiyange apawathwimen pasu, unwahansege shishya pujya, ambauldeniye jinawansha nayaka swamindrayan wahanse 1986 di wiharadhipathi dhurayata pathwu athara, unwahanse wisin 1992 warshaye di pujya rajakiya panditha diwiyagala wijithasiha himipanan wiharadhipathi dhurayata path karana ladi.

ihatha 31-34 shuddha wu kuraan wakyaye (garbhashaye thathwaya pilibadawa pawasana) karanayata amatharawa thawath karana kihipayak pawasayi enam, niyatha washayenma (yuga awasan) mohotha pilibadawa gnyanaya aththe allah (dewiyan) hamuwe pamani.

ganja kawi hiru awarata yaddi......gomman kaluwara gala haleddi.....thanikamayi paluwayi.....dasa athe pathirila.....adura nathiwennatama pahan dalwena paye..sada awith hinaweyi pol athu piragena..suwada dasa atha didi saman mal pideddi...mal suwada hoyala yanna sitha kiyawi..mal pani rodaka rasa balannata kasi natha..kansiya maka ganna wenayamda deyak natha..sitha dasa atha mata watuhuna kramayakda..soya dasa atha labuni ithiri wu kasi..nagge pagale aran piyambauwa handiyata.."aba" athidayi soya ringuwa pot ekata..dila atha athi kasi aba hata mumunala..dagaththa kalla wata pitath balala..kaluware hada eliye ringuwa ala lagataothala gaththa mama aba dun kalla..kala gini ganna gada dasa athama pathireddipiyambauwa sura lowata mada himi himihitama...padama ganata gaththu sapa dewi chuttakinwaren mage sayikale gedara yannata api..ammagen plentiya illa hadagenaaamstron lage gamana yamuda api me raye..plentiya sini wadi thiyala patapilendagaththa buru ada paluwa midule madinsini wadi plentiya thola gana athara madasada awith ma lagata enawadayi ahanawa..mata hithayi yanna ehe mata bayayi eeth danapi imuda me durin mata mehema hari somiyaube siyumali sina dakkama sada komalimata hina yanawa dan nawaththannata baruwa kammalikamata....., mage noriko kshanika prathichara: 9

jawipen me wiruddhathwaya gilihunu gaman, indiyanu wyapthawadaya thawa duratath wyaptha kirime wagakima saha ee thula shri lankawe deshapalanikawa balaya indiyawata hithawathwa allime wagakima, rajendran rajamahendran hewath kili maharaja aarambha karana aakaraya api wimasa balamu.
